enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
sentences: In informal consultations, the US, with the RUSSIAN FEDERATION, addressed the issue of late payment of dues, seeking information on existing practices in other UN fora.
Speaking for several developing countries, IRAN asked for a postponement of the discussion until COP-6, and ARGENTINA added that the options included were unacceptable.
The US stated that 89% of dues had been collected this year, while the Secretariat noted that, although this was correct, one- third of Parties had not yet paid.
Chair Mahmoud Ould El Ghaouth (Mauritania) said he would transmit to SBI the recommendation that the issue be discussed at COP-6.
